title: Deutsch Direkt! [text]
brief_description: The book enables you to get the most out of the language course offered in the videos. It contains the texts of conversations and interviews recorded and filmed for the programs in West Germany and Austria together with language notes, exercises, background information, reading passages and progress checks. It also includes a handy reference section.
